text:
Mouloud Achour (19 March 1944 – 24 December 2020) was an Algerian writer, professor, and journalist.
Achour was a member and then chairman of the executive council of the Public Establishment of Television. He also directed the cabinet for the Ministry of Communications. He was editorial director of Casbah Éditions in Algiers.
Achour died on 24 December 2020 at the age of 76.
